title: Botswana Consumer Credit
description: Consumer Credit in Botswana increased to 46903.89 BWP Million in August from 46439.73 BWP Million in July of 2022. Consumer Credit in Botswana averaged 24896.67 BWP Million from 2007 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 46903.89 BWP Million in August of 2022 and a record low of 6325.70 BWP Million in January of 2007. This page provides - Botswana Consumer Credit - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of Botswana
